issue.title: §[fs.op.absolute] Non-normative encouragement should be Recommended practice

discussion.p: [fs.op.absolute] has a note giving strong encouragement, which should be normative:

blockquote.p: [Note 3: Implementations are strongly encouraged to not query secondary storage, and not consider `!exists(p)` an error. — end note]

discussion.p: The part about `!exists(p)` not being an error could definitely be a Recommended practice paragraph. Referring to "secondary storage" might need to be phrased differently to be normative (maybe with a note clarifying that the normative wording is referring to "secondary storage").
Set priority to 4 after reflector poll.
